events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position, and the resume looks promising with relevant experience in full-stack development.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering, focusing on software development roles based on the skills and keywords found in their resume.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to the candidate to ensure smooth communication and proper coordination for the interview process.
The initial phone screening with the candidate went well, discussing their experience in software engineering and their familiarity with DevOps practices.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward to the technical interview stage after the initial screening.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 5th at 10 am UTC, focusing on coding skills and system design.
